original_text: The Lord tells the king of Nineveh that he has done bad things against God. And the king has told his people that they should do wrong things.
korean_text: 여호와께 악을 꾀하는 한 사람이 너희 중에서 나와서 사악한 것을 권하는도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord tells the king of Nineveh
that he has done bad things against God
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 하나님께 악한 행동을 했다는 것을

sentences.original_text: And the king has told his people
that they should do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 잘못된 행동을 해야 한다는 것을
